title: Part A

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Full credit earned if the student describes the velocity function as being a reciprocal function and explaining that natural logarithm is the integral of the reciprocal function.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.
